duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead IT department operational planning and projects and organize and negotiate the allocation of IT resources.
Work with stakeholders to define business and systems requirements for new technology implementations.
Ensure the efficient utilization of IT resources – including personnel and equipment – across the organization.
Oversee all reports and documentation related to network and systems operations.
Develop maintenance schedules for network and systems equipment.
Conduct system feasibility studies and testing.
Approve purchase of equipment and supplies in order to meet operational requirements of the business.
Manage operations staffing, including recruitment, supervision, scheduling, development, evaluation, and disciplinary actions for two IT employees.
Establish and maintain regular written and in-person communications with the organization’s executives, department heads, and end users regarding pertinent IT activities.
Manage contracts with vendors (e.g., development platforms, telecommunication companies, and managed service providers).

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in Computer Science, IT or relevant field
